bike.description: FACT 11m carbon front triangle, SWAT EMT tool cradle, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, full FACT carbon rear triangle, tapered headtube, carbon PF30 BB, full internal shift/brake routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 100mm

components.description: FOX/Specialized remote Mini-Brain w/ AUTOSAG, Kashima coating, inertia valve w/ Kevlar hose, Brain Fade adjust, 205x53mm, 100mm travel
Custom RockShox SID World Cup 29 Brain, inertia valve damper, Solo Air spring, tapered carbon crown/steerer, top-mount Brain Fade and rebound adj., 15mm thru-axle, 100mm travel
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
PF30, OS press-in bearings, sealed cartridge
Specialized carbon, single bolt, 27.2mm, S: 350mm, Others: 400mm
Specialized 7050 hard anodized alloy, single bolt, 31.8mm
